website_summaries.verdict: A well-rounded truck tire with a slight emphasis on off-road performance through challenging, loose terrain.
pros: Extra bulky tread lugs do a good job of biting into wet terrain like mud for extra traction and control
Unique shoulder lugs help improve cornering for better control over turns
cons: Heavy-duty tread pattern can increase rolling resistance and decrease general highway performance

customer_reviews.title: Noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these, well made, agressive tread and fit well on my 2016 2500 HD. I knew they would effect the ride which they did but they are a little noisy even with 20 miles on them, If you want a quiet mud tire these are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: SSKevinSC

customer_reviews.title: Good tires at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Good tires at a great price! After I got my tires and had them installed a friend saw them and bought the same tires for his truck. Good handling and very low noise. Can't tell much difference from the Mitchlen tires I had been running. Much better traction. Free shipping w/ prime, fast delivery and no hassle. No other tire company in town would match the price.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Livergood

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Put these on a 2018 GMC Sierra 4x4 about 5000 miles ago. Great tire! I used Counteract tire balancing beads and tires ride well. You do hear them roar but that is to be expected with a M/T tire. My brother even commented on the wear the other day, he said the were holding up very well they hardly looked used at all. Much better grip off road than stock Goodyear. To early to tell life of tire but from first 5000 miles looks like very long life for M/T.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: 275/65 r20 on stock 2014 Ram 1500 4x4 rims. Very aggressive look, a little road noise but not bad at all. Great buy! Delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: love these tires
customer_reviews.text: love these tires, absolutely no road noise, the only downfall is that it grabs some of the bigger rocks but with time and speed they come out lol i will be buying these tires again when i need them highly recommend these tires. i have mine installed on my 2009 ram 2500 6.7 diesel. cant complain for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved my 2014 Ram 1500 for as long as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Aggressive looking Mud Tire for a reasonable price. Loved my 2014 Ram 1500 for as long as I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Tsegaye Gebremariam

customer_reviews.title: Quiet for the tread pattern.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how quiet these are even at highway speeds considering the tread on them. They ride well and I have 0 complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schoen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Fast shipping. Very tough looking tire. Quiet on the road as well. This tire has more tread and looks rough compared to tires that cost $300-$400 per tire. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for my F350 look good and are not noisy on the road
customer_reviews.author: Hugh F.

customer_reviews.title: Just bought my second set, the first set I ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my second set, the first set I put 40k miles with my Ram 2500 towing light cargo trailer daily. keep them rotated and they will last
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: So far they run well and are pretty quiet on the highway
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I expected. So far they run well and are pretty quiet on the highway. Only had the chance to use once in minimal snow but they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tires!
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. Nice combination between a road and off road tire. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Danl70

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were for my son in law. He really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. I got exactly what was described to me. Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: rosco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tires, especially in snow when we get it. Low noise and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Mason M.

customer_reviews.title: 275/65/20 - Looks better than I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: 275/65/20 - Looks better than I was hoping for. Road noise is not bad. Shipping was great, arrived a week earlier than scheduled. No lift or leveling kit on the truck just stock suspension. Any bigger on a stock Ram 2500 you may have issues with rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good so far has some road noise but not bad at all for a mud grip tire
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tires..! Very glad I got them..look good and sound good, not too loud....
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Best price on the firestone Mt 10 ply
customer_reviews.text: The price for 275/65/20E was unmatched anywhere. My 2014 ram 2500 is very hard on tires but I have found that if I rotate every oil change (7500 miles) they last about 30k in my harsh off roads
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These tires are awesome. Timely shipment
customer_reviews.text: These tires are awesome. Timely shipment, nice thick tread, not too loud on the street either. Good traction off road.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tires!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these tires a few weeks ago for my 2014 Tundra. They are tremendous in mud, handle great on road, and give my truck a great look. The only negative is the low hum when driving but it isn’t noticeable if you have the radio on. I highly recommend these tires!
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that they would be loud after reading some reviews, but I am very pleased to say that they make almost no noise on my 2012 F250 Diesel.I love the look, and look forward to trying out the very aggressive tread pattern while plowing. I am a little concerned that they may not be all that great on ice because they are a solid lug with no syping.
customer_reviews.author: bayhead

customer_reviews.title: I love
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought these tire's a long time ago. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain but the driver was just going to leave ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain but the driver was just going to leave them sit on my front porch . 1200 tires shouldn't just sit out front of my house with out signing a paper ..... Ups drivers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for this type of tire
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for this type of tire. Great traction on and off road and they are wearing like iron. Noise is also very acceptable for a big lug mud tire. I didn't give them 5 stars because they are horrible in light snow and icy/slippery Winter roads. They dig fine in deep snow and seem to do OK in wet snow, but if you are buying these for Winter tires they will need to be siped or you need to look at something else.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Ruggles

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck with mud tires
customer_reviews.text: Much better wear life than nitto trail Grapplers and perform better off-road. And we're half the price for a better product by far
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: These tires are nasty and they are 10 ply. ...
customer_reviews.text: These tires are nasty and they are 10 ply... in the past i have paid almost twice as much they are well worth the money they are going on a 2013 f150 with 2.5 inch level/lift with a 20x9 -0 offset wheel.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

product_meta.title: Firestone Destination M/T Mud Terrain Radial Tire - 275/65R20 126Q
product_meta.description:
The Firestone Destination M/T tire is an aggressive mud and all-terrain tire that is best suited for off-roading or work trucks that need durability, mud traction, traction in loose gravel and sand. You will not get stuck with the Firestone Destination M/T tire thanks to the large tread blocks and wide open spaces to evacuate the loose material. In rock and on gravel, added protection comes from Firestone's "long-link" rubber formulations that are treadwear and cracking resistant. This same rubber is in the sidewall of the tire to protect against curbing or damage from off-road hazards.

All Firestone Destination M/T tires feature O-bead technology. This improves uniformity and ride comfort through the use of a single continuous strand of cable in the bead construction. The tire also has a large rim guard to protect the wheels, and is even pinned for studs for extra grip on snow and ice.
feature_bullets: High-performance summer tires for sporty coupes and sedans
Exceptional cornering power and even wear characteristics
This product is not for sale in the state of Arkansas
High-performance summer tires for sporty coupes and sedans
Exceptional cornering power and even wear characteristics
CO-CS (Computer Optimized Component System) combines tread design, materials, and construction to create optimal tire performance
Dura-loc technology resists on- and off-highway hazards
L.L. Carbon (Long Link) resists cracking and tearing, improving tread wear and tire life
O-bead enhances comfort through a single, continuous cable in bead construction
